excerpt: "On September 17, 2021, the Guiding Opinions on Strengthening Overall Governance of Internet Information Service Algorithms became applicable, aimed at the gradual establishment of an integrated management model for the security of algorithms, including a well-established regulatory system and a standardized ecology of algorithms."
